title: We’ve Profiled A Bunch Of Aussie Memes And We’re Starting With “Not Bhed, Good Soyze”
text:
Ever wonder what the dude behind “not bhed, good soyze” is doing, or how Shannon Noll is trucking after memes shot him back into relevance a few years ago? Maybe you found yourself at the gym the other day, staring into a mirror, thinking about Zyzz and his brother, Chestbrah. How the hell did all of that happen anyway?

Recently, we found ourselves wondering the same thing – so we decided to do some deep diving investigations into the people behind so many of Australia’s great memes.

It’s all part of our new weekly series, ’15 Minutes’, streaming on Facebook Watch every Monday night starting from September 30. Our host, comedian and meme-wizard Nina Oyama, has traveled all over Australia, picking the brains of some of the country’s most recognisable internet talismans.

Join us as we go behind the headlines and funny pictures and try to understand the highs of virality (all the fame, social clout, and endless notoriety) and the lows, too: when the attention is all dried up and you’re wondering what’s next.

Everybody gets 15 minutes of fame… but then what?
description: '15 Minutes', streaming on Facebook Watch every Monday night starting from September 30, will feature the likes of Shannon Noll, Zyzz and Chestbrah.
